idea-plugin.name: Roflcopter
idea-plugin.description:
Roflcopter (noun) 1. a breeding ground for new ReSharper extensions 2. a collection of small, handy ReSharper utilities

At the moment the following features have been ported to Rider.
  • Git Branch Name Live Template (no Live Template configuration in Rider atm., see RIDER-548. Use VS to edit live templates.)
  • "Mismatch between type and file name" warning
  • "Assertion message is invalid" warning

Tags: rider c#
